paragraphs: Cuba has always fascinated and intrigued people from around the world and led to the foundation of the Elliott Erwitt Havana Club 7 Fellowship for Documentary Photography. Founded in a shared passion for Cuba and its people we wish to build a legacy of Cuba today and take it into the future built on the work of Elliott Erwitt.
As the Fellowship evolves you will be able to acquire unique documentary photography and by doing so support future recipients continuing the legacy.
